item.title: kubernetes-playground-in-seconds
item.description: Get kubernetes cluster in seconds to play with Go to https://labs.play-with-k8s.com/ Login and execute below command on instance1 kubeadm init --apiserver-advertise-address $(hostname -i) Copy kubeadm join command from the kubeadm init output and execute join in instance2 kubeadm join --token SOMETOKEN SOMEIPADDRESS --discovery-token-ca-cert-hash SOMESHAHASH kubectl apply -n kube-system -f \ "https://cloud.weave.works/k8s/net?k8s-version=$(kubectl version | base64 |tr -d '\n')"
